column2: but wanted to review update anyway. Jinya is awesome about accommodating individual order preferences. I wanted the sprouting up ramen but I don't eat pork
column3: so they made it all chicken based. My partner doesn't eat vegetables (lol) so they made his without those. Some places will modify orders but seem really annoyed by it; our waiter was happy and helpful to accommodate our order. Just another reason jinya will always be a Houston fav!
